page.title: 20A Typical Day in My Life
page.content: I wake up at 6:30 a.m.and get up at 7:10.I wash and get dressed then I go downstairs.We start breakfast at 7:30 and our whole family has it together. My brother Gary comes in from his paper-round before we have breakfast and our dog Meg comes to greet me.Then I walk to school. School starts at 9:00 a.m.and finishes at 3:30 p.m. In the morning we have assembly, then maths and, after break, English.Between 12:00 and 1:15 p.m. is lunch time.After lunch I play in the playground until the whistle goes.In the afternoon we have geography, history or art.I go home and change and if it is Monday or Thursday I go to dancing classes or other-wise I make things or read.At 5:30 p.m. I have tea with the rest of my family. Later I watch television. At 9:00 p.m. I go to bed.
